title: How to Make Coca Cola Marinade

steps.title: Mix the ingredients in a bowl with a whisk.
steps.content: Mix the ingredients in a bowl with a whisk. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Use immediately over the steak pieces and be sure to coat thoroughly.
steps.content: Use immediately over the steak pieces and be sure to coat thoroughly.

steps.title: Chill the steaks in the refrigerator for at least 6 hours or overnight, for best flavor.
steps.content: Chill the steaks in the refrigerator for at least 6 hours or overnight, for best flavor. [2] X Research source
